content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on accrued rating decisions, including
format for an accrued rating decision
addressing the issue of accrued or substitution in the rating decision
handling the accrued rating decision
, and
preparing the coded conclusion for accrued claims
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D  - Rating Accrued Claims
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D
